name: Add new Google Sheets rows for every record found in Datastore
description: Streamline your data management process by automatically transferring search results from your Datastore to Google Sheets. This template ensures that every time a record is found in Datastore, the relevant information is seamlessly added as a new row in your Google Sheets. This integration not only saves you time but also enhances your data organization, making it easier to analyze and manage your records efficiently.
